mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rental_cars (car_code, car_type_code, car_number, model_year, branch_code, car_status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{carCode}, #{carTypeCode}, #{carNumber}, #{modelYear}, #{branchCode}, #{carStatus}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE rental_cars SET car_type_code= #{carTypeCode}, car_number = #{carNumber}, model_year = #{modelYear}, branch_code = #{branchCode}, car_status = #{carStatus}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE car_code = #{carCode}
